column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I am not knowledgeable about art history or art at all
column2: but I really like the Art Institute. The architecture is a little iffy
column3: because there's no real direction or order to it--you can pretty much go in any section at any point. My only regret about my visit is that I didn't give myself more time--I only spent a few hours there
column4: but by the end of it
column5: I was exhausted. Leave a full day
column6: maybe a day and a half
column7: if you want enough time to really spend time with everything.
